trans-unit.source: Provides support to convert an object to a lowercase string.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter> class allows an object to be converted to a lowercase string.
This class also provides support to verify that an object type can be converted to a lowercase string before the conversion is made.
The methods of <xref:System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter> take as a parameter an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface.
This interface provides contextual information about a component.
Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.LowerCaseStringConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object can be converted to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
This interface provides contextual information about a component.
Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
The type of object to convert.
`true` if the parameters describe an object that can be converted to a lowercase string object; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an object can be converted to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
This interface provides contextual information about a component.
Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
The type of object to convert.
`true` if the parameters describe an object that can be converted to a lowercase string object; otherwise, `false`.
Converts an object from its original value to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
This interface provides contextual information about a component.
Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information.
The `data` parameter object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete.
Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> class.
The object to convert.
A lowercase string object.
Converts an object to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
This method uses an object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> interface as the `ctx` parameter.
This interface provides contextual information about a component.
Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> is commonly used in type conversion.
The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information.
The `value` object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete.
Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> class.
The object to convert.
The type of object to convert.
A lowercase string object.
